trans-unit.source: Enables developers to override the rendering for only the selected sections of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> controls in an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase"></xref> zone.
trans-unit.target: Permite aos programadores substituir a composição para apenas as secções selecionadas de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"> </xref> controla num <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase"> </xref> zona.

trans-unit.source: Chrome refers to the peripheral user interface (UI) elements that frame each Web Parts control or server control contained in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Chrome refere-se os elementos de interface (IU) do utilizador periféricos esse período de cada controlo de peças Web ou controlo de servidor contido numa zona.

trans-unit.source: The chrome for a control includes its border, its title bar, and the icons, title text, and verbs menu that appear within the title bar.
trans-unit.target: O chrome para um controlo inclui o respetivo limite, respectiva barra de título e o ícones, o texto do título e o menu de verbos que aparecem na barra de título.

trans-unit.source: The appearance of the chrome is set at the zone level, and applies to all the controls in the zone.
trans-unit.target: O aspecto do Cromado é definido ao nível da zona e aplica-se a todos os controlos na zona.

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control set uses the EditorPartChrome class to render the chrome for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: O conjunto de controlo de peças Web utiliza a classe de EditorPartChrome para compor o chrome para <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controlos.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: Additionally, this class provides a way for developers to customize the rendering of any <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls in an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> zone.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, esta classe fornece uma forma para programadores personalizar a composição de qualquer <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controla num <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase>zona.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartChrome.CreateEditorPartChromeStyle%2A> method to customize some specific style attributes defined in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> zone.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, pode substituir o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartChrome.CreateEditorPartChromeStyle%2A>método para personalizar a alguns atributos de estilo específica definida no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase>zona.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartChrome.CreateEditorPartChromeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The EditorPartChrome class contains several important methods that are useful when you want to override the rendering of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: A classe de EditorPartChrome contém vários métodos importantes que são úteis quando pretender substituir a composição de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controlos.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: One is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartChrome.%23ctor%2A> constructor, which you use when you override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase.CreateEditorPartChrome%2A> method in a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> class to create an instance of your custom EditorPartChrome object.
trans-unit.target: Um é o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartChrome.%23ctor%2A>construtor, o que utilizar quando poderá substituir o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase.CreateEditorPartChrome%2A>método personalizadas <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase>classe para criar uma instância do seu objeto EditorPartChrome personalizado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase.CreateEditorPartChrome%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartChrome.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Another useful method is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartChrome.RenderPartContents%2A> method, which you can use to control the rendering of the content area of controls in a zone (as opposed to chrome elements such as headers, footers, and title bars).
trans-unit.target: Outro método útil é a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartChrome.RenderPartContents%2A>método, o que pode utilizar para controlar a composição da área do conteúdo de controlos numa zona (por oposição a elementos chrome, tais como cabeçalhos, rodapés de página e barras de título).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartChrome.RenderPartContents%2A>

trans-unit.source: Finally, if you want complete programmatic control over all aspects of rendering the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls, you can override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartChrome.RenderEditorPart%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Por fim, se pretender que o controlo total de programático através de todos os aspetos da composição do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controlos, pode substituir o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartChrome.RenderEditorPart%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartChrome.RenderEditorPart%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartChrome"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartChrome"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The EditorPartChrome constructor initializes a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartChrome> class.
trans-unit.target: O construtor de EditorPartChrome inicializa uma nova instância de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartChrome>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartChrome>

trans-unit.source: It is used primarily by an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> zone in its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase.CreateEditorPartChrome%2A> method to create an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartChrome> object that handles the chrome rendering and any custom rendering for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls in the zone.
trans-unit.target: É utilizada principalmente por um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase>zona no respetivo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase.CreateEditorPartChrome%2A>método para criar uma instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartChrome>objeto que processa a composição do chrome e qualquer composição personalizada para <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controlos na zona.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartChrome> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase.CreateEditorPartChrome%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: The associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Associada <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The that zone refers to is .
trans-unit.target: The that zone refers to is .

trans-unit.source: Creates the style object that supplies style attributes for each <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> control rendered by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartChrome"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Cria o objeto de estilo que fornece os atributos de estilo para cada <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"> </xref> controlo composto pelo <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartChrome"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The CreateEditorPartChromeStyle method creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object that is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartChrome> object to render an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: O método CreateEditorPartChromeStyle cria um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>objeto que é utilizado pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartChrome>objeto compor um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartChrome> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: The control that is currently being rendered.
trans-unit.target: O controlo que está atualmente a ser composto.

trans-unit.source: The type of chrome for a particular control; one of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeType"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de cromado para um determinado controlo; um do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeType"> </xref> valores de enumeração.

trans-unit.source: A that contains style attributes for editorPart.
trans-unit.target: A que contém os atributos de estilo de editorPart .

trans-unit.source: The control that editorPart refers to is .
trans-unit.target: O controlo que editorPart refere-se ao é .

trans-unit.source: chromeType is not a .
trans-unit.target: chromeTypeis not a .

trans-unit.source: Performs tasks that must be done prior to rendering <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: Executa tarefas que tem de ser feitas antes da composição <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"> </xref> controlos.

trans-unit.source: The PerformPreRender method allows you to perform tasks that must be done during the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender> event and cannot be done when the control is rendered, such as applying a style sheet to a control.
trans-unit.target: O método PerformPreRender permite-lhe efetuar tarefas que tem de ser efetuadas durante a <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender>eventos e não pode ser efetuada quando o controlo é composto, como a aplicação de uma folha de estilo para um controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender>

trans-unit.source: Renders a complete <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> control with all its sections.
trans-unit.target: Composições um concluída <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"> </xref> controlo com todas as respetivas secções.

trans-unit.source: The RenderEditorPart method renders the complete <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control, with header, contents, and footer.
trans-unit.target: O método RenderEditorPart compõe o concluída <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>controlo, com o cabeçalho, o conteúdo e o rodapé.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: Overriding this method gives a developer complete programmatic control over rendering all aspects of `editorPart`; for that reason, overriding this method is quite complex.
trans-unit.target: Substituir oferece este método um programador concluir programático controlo sobre todos os aspetos de composição `editorPart`; por esse motivo, substituir este método é bastante complexa.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that receives the `editorPart` content.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> que recebe o `editorPart` conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: The control currently being rendered.
trans-unit.target: O controlo atualmente a ser composto.

trans-unit.source: The control that editorPart refers to is .
trans-unit.target: O controlo que editorPart refere-se ao é .

trans-unit.source: Renders the main content area of an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"></xref> control, excluding the header and footer.
trans-unit.target: Compõe a área de conteúdo principal de um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart"> </xref> controlo, excluindo o cabeçalho e rodapé.

trans-unit.source: The RenderPartContents method enables you to override the rendering of the body area of `editorPart`, while leaving rendering of the header and footer to the default rendering.
trans-unit.target: O método RenderPartContents permite-lhe substituir a composição da área do corpo do `editorPart`, mantendo a composição do cabeçalho e rodapé para a composição predefinida.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that receives the `editorPart` content.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> que recebe o `editorPart` conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: The control currently being rendered.
trans-unit.target: O controlo atualmente a ser composto.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase"></xref> zone.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma referência para associada <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase"> </xref> zona.

trans-unit.source: The Zone property provides a reference to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> zone that contains the controls for which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartChrome> object provides rendering.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de zona fornece uma referência para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase>zona que contém os controlos para o qual o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartChrome>objeto fornece composição.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartChrome> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: A reference to an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase"></xref> that is associated with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartChrome"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma referência a um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase"> </xref> que se encontra associado a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartChrome"> </xref>.
